question.title: How to adapt Gradle plugin LazyPublishArtifact for from Gradle 7 to 8?
question.body:
Currently I have a PublishArtifact jarArtifact = new LazyPublishArtifact(taskProvider) which worked well or Gradle 7.6 and before (I was using 7.3.3). Now I need to upgrade to Gradle 8.13 to use Java-21 where the single arg constructor for LazyPublishArtifact is removed and now it requires a FileResolver and a TaskDependencyFactory as well.

How do I use these two new parameters?
I am looking for examples and references (not documentations) of how to work with these two new params. I am aware that they are internal APIs but I am unaware about their public counterparts.

answers.body:
Currently a workaround that works is by using something like:

final ProjectInternal projectInternal = (ProjectInternal) project;  
final FileResolver fileResolver = projectInternal.getFileResolver();   
final TaskDependencyFactory taskDependencyFactory = projectInternal.getTaskDependencyFactory();   
final PublishArtifact artifact = new LazyPublishArtifact(task, fileResolver, taskDependencyFactory);
